languages.text: {n}Marazhai reaches out and touches the mark emblazoned on your neck.{/n} "My little pet, how pretty my mark looks on your flesh. It gives meaning to your existence. It tells the world who owns you. Perfection."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай протягивает руку и дотрагивается до клейма, красующегося на вашей шее.{/n} "Мо{mf|й|я} маленьк{mf|ий|ая} звер{mf|ек|ушка}, как же тебя красит мой знак на твоей плоти. Придает смысл твоему существованию. Дает знать всему миру, кто владеет тобой. Совершенство".

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai reaches out and touches the mark emblazoned on your neck.{/n} "My little pet, how pretty my mark looks on your flesh. It gives meaning to your existence. It tells the world who owns you. Perfection."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Маражай протягивает руку и дотрагивается до клейма, красующегося на вашей шее.{/n} "Мо{mf|й|я} маленьк{mf|ий|ая} звер{mf|ек|ушка}, как же тебя красит мой знак на твоей плоти. Придает смысл твоему существованию. Дает знать всему миру, кто владеет тобой. Совершенство".

{n}Marazhai alarga la mano y toca la marca que tienes grabada en el cuello.{/n} «Ah, mi mascotita. Qué bien queda mi marca en tu carne. Da significado a tu existencia. Le dice al mundo a quién perteneces. Es perfecta».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai reaches out and touches the mark emblazoned on your neck.{/n} "My little pet, how pretty my mark looks on your flesh. It gives meaning to your existence. It tells the world who owns you. Perfection."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai alarga la mano y toca la marca que tienes grabada en el cuello.{/n} «Ah, mi mascotita. Qué bien queda mi marca en tu carne. Da significado a tu existencia. Le dice al mundo a quién perteneces. Es perfecta».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋伸出手，摸了摸你脖子上的烙印。{/n}“我的小宠物，我的烙印烙在你的肉体上，看起来真漂亮。它赋予了你存在的意义，告诉世人你的主人是谁。真是太完美了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai reaches out and touches the mark emblazoned on your neck.{/n} "My little pet, how pretty my mark looks on your flesh. It gives meaning to your existence. It tells the world who owns you. Perfection."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋伸出手，摸了摸你脖子上的烙印。{/n}“我的小宠物，我的烙印烙在你的肉体上，看起来真漂亮。它赋予了你存在的意义，告诉世人你的主人是谁。真是太完美了。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは手を伸ばして、あなたの首に刻まれたマークに触れる。{/n}「俺の小さなペットよ、俺の印が良く似合っている。それはお前の存在に意味を与え、世界にお前が俺の所有物であることを示す。完璧じゃないか」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai reaches out and touches the mark emblazoned on your neck.{/n} "My little pet, how pretty my mark looks on your flesh. It gives meaning to your existence. It tells the world who owns you. Perfection."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは手を伸ばして、あなたの首に刻まれたマークに触れる。{/n}「俺の小さなペットよ、俺の印が良く似合っている。それはお前の存在に意味を与え、世界にお前が俺の所有物であることを示す。完璧じゃないか」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai tend la main pour toucher la marque apposée sur votre cou.{/n} « Ma marque vous va comme un gant, {mf|cher petit|chère petite} esclave... Elle donne du sens à votre existence et proclame le nom de votre seigneur et maître aux yeux du monde entier. Parfait. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai reaches out and touches the mark emblazoned on your neck.{/n} "My little pet, how pretty my mark looks on your flesh. It gives meaning to your existence. It tells the world who owns you. Perfection."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai tend la main pour toucher la marque apposée sur votre cou.{/n} « Ma marque vous va comme un gant, {mf|cher petit|chère petite} esclave... Elle donne du sens à votre existence et proclame le nom de votre seigneur et maître aux yeux du monde entier. Parfait. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai streckt die Hand aus und berührt das Mal, das in deinen Hals eingebrannt ist.{/n} "Mein kleines Haustier, wie hübsch mein Mal in Eurem Fleisch aussieht. Es verleiht Eurer Existenz eine Bedeutung. Es sagt der Welt, wer Euch besitzt. Perfekt."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai reaches out and touches the mark emblazoned on your neck.{/n} "My little pet, how pretty my mark looks on your flesh. It gives meaning to your existence. It tells the world who owns you. Perfection."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai streckt die Hand aus und berührt das Mal, das in deinen Hals eingebrannt ist.{/n} "Mein kleines Haustier, wie hübsch mein Mal in Eurem Fleisch aussieht. Es verleiht Eurer Existenz eine Bedeutung. Es sagt der Welt, wer Euch besitzt. Perfekt."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai reaches out and touches the mark emblazoned on your neck.{/n} "My little pet, how pretty my mark looks on your flesh. It gives meaning to your existence. It tells the world who owns you. Perfection."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, elini uzatıp boynuna dağlanmış sembole dokunuyor.{/n} "Küçük köpeğim... Sembolüm tenine ne de yakıştı. Varlığına anlam katıyor âdeta. Sahibin kim, herkes biliyor. Şahane."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai reaches out and touches the mark emblazoned on your neck.{/n} "My little pet, how pretty my mark looks on your flesh. It gives meaning to your existence. It tells the world who owns you. Perfection."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai elini uzatıyor. Boynuna dağlanmış sembole dokunuyor.{/n} "Küçük köpeğim... Sembolüm ne de yakıştı tenine. Varlığına bir anlam katıyor âdeta. Sahibin kim, herkes biliyor. Şahane."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
